name: Speedster 2000
description: A robust mountain bike designed for extreme terrains, featuring superior suspension and durable tires.

name: EcoRider X
description: An eco-friendly electric bike, perfect for city commutes with a long-lasting battery and a sleek design.

name: Urban Commuter Pro
description: Lightweight and fast, this road bike is built for urban commuting, offering agility and speed on city streets.

name: TrailBlazer XT
description: Built for the toughest trails, this mountain bike combines durability and performance with a rugged design.

name: SpeedDemon V3
description: A high-performance racing bike designed for speed enthusiasts, featuring advanced aerodynamics and lightweight materials.

name: Adventure Cruiser 500
description: Designed for long-distance journeys, this touring bike offers comfort and durability, making it perfect for exploring new horizons.
